scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.start:render: psql "$DATABASE_URL" < server/db/create_schema.sql && psql "$DATABASE_URL" < server/db/seeds.sql && npm --prefix server run start
scripts.render-build: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.render-start: npm run install:all && npm run start
